translation.en: Shit, I'm sorry.
No, don't feel bad for me.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas pour moi.

translation.en: I feel bad for you with that insane verdict.
translation.fr: Je suis triste pour toi et je trouve ce verdict délirant.

translation.en: I know, I didn't get my tax forms in on time.
translation.fr: Eh oui, je n'avais pas reçu mes déclarations à temps.

translation.en: So fucking what?
The IRS isn't gonna get a new coffee machine?
translation.fr: Ça les a privés d'une nouvelle cafetière ?

translation.en: Exactly, and who cares if you have a drink now and again?
translation.fr: Exactement, et on s'en fiche si tu bois un verre de temps en temps.

translation.en: I don't even party anymore.
It's just, I was so messed up for so long, no one cares.
translation.fr: J'étais tout le temps défoncée, on s'en fiche.

translation.en: Well, you shouldn't have to go to rehab.
translation.fr: Tu ne devrais pas aller en cure.

translation.en: Oh, I agree.
But unfortunately, I do.
Unless someone else goes in my place.
translation.fr: Sauf si quelqu'un d'autre me remplace.

translation.en: How do you mean?
Someone who looks a lot like me.
What?
When I said I had you in mind for a part, I wasn't bullshitting.
translation.fr: Quand je parlais d'un rôle pour toi, je déconnais pas.

translation.en: I'm the part and you're the only one auditioning.
translation.fr: Le rôle, c'est moi, et tu es la seule à faire des essais.

translation.en: Think of it like a stand- in job for a rehab movie.
translation.fr: Vois ça comme de la doublure pour un film sur une cure de désintox.

translation.en: Except there's no cameras and no movie.
translation.fr: Sauf qu'il n'y a ni caméra ni film.

translation.en: Oh my God!
Well…
I mean, that would be--
Could be highly illegal.
Technically.
Do you actually think we could get away with it?
translation.fr: Tu penses vraiment que ça pourrait marcher ?

translation.en: No one's seen my face in years, and I could've had work done.
translation.fr: On ne m'a pas vue depuis des années, je pourrais avoir fait de la chirurgie.

translation.en: Your face is as good as mine.
I'd do it myself, but there's someone…
translation.fr: J'irais bien, mais il y a quelqu'un…

translation.en: …there's something…
very important that I have to take care of and…
translation.fr: de très important dont je dois m'occuper et…

translation.en: I'd offer to pay you money, but I'm kind of broke right now.
translation.fr: Je t'offrirais bien du fric mais je suis fauchée.

translation.en: If I did it, could we go back to the way things were
translation.fr: Si je le faisais, on pourrait refaire comme avant

translation.en: and I could be your stand- in again?
Hell, no. I'm through with acting.
translation.fr: Surtout pas. J'ai arrêté le cinéma.

translation.en: Why? You are the best.
The best?
At being hit in the face by ladders and watermelons?
translation.fr: Pour me prendre dans la gueule des échelles et des pastèques ?

translation.en: You're the queen of comedy. You're Candy Black.
translation.fr: Tu es la reine des comédies. Tu es Candy Black.

translation.en: Not anymore.
I don't want to be an actress, and I sure as fuck don't want to be famous.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être comédienne et je veux encore moins être célèbre.

translation.en: Being famous is like being in the back of a sports car
translation.fr: La célébrité, c'est être à l'arrière d'une voiture de course

translation.en: driven by a bunch of dicks.
My whole career was a mistake.
I got my first acting job
because I was working as a carpenter on some awful comedy.
translation.fr: parce que je travaillais comme menuisière dans une comédie atroce.

translation.en: I was rigging stunt tables, and one day, the lead actress just never showed up.
translation.fr: Je remontais des tables, et un jour, l'actrice principale n'est pas venue.

translation.en: Turned out she died, an overdose. That should've been a warning.
translation.fr: Elle était morte d'une OD. J'aurais dû y voir un signe.

translation.en: Anyway, they needed someone to get planked
translation.fr: Bref, ils avaient une scène de cascade

translation.en: and I said, Sure, I'll do it.
translation.fr: et j'ai dit : OK, pourquoi pas.

translation.en: Anyway, I'm sick of that shit.
Unlike you. You always loved being on a film set.
translation.fr: Mais toi, tu as toujours adoré être sur un plateau.

translation.en: Yes, I did.
Listen, I'll do it.
I'll do the rehab thing.
Yeah?
Amazing.
But my price is,
when I get out, you take an acting job,
translation.fr: c'est qu'à ma sortie, tu prennes un rôle,

translation.en: and make me your stand- in.
translation.fr: et que je sois ta doublure.

translation.en: Deal?
Deal.
- Candy! - Candy!
Come on, Candy, give us a picture!
So, em…
I don't have to go away, after all.
I'm so relieved.
That's amazing. I'm happy we still get to talk.
translation.fr: C'est génial. Je suis content qu'on se parle encore.

translation.en: So,
how's your book coming along?
I've given up trying to write in my apartment.
It's too distracting.
I found this bar around the corner that doesn't have Wi- Fi,
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé un bar pas loin sans wifi,

translation.en: the one bar in Brooklyn not full of hipsters with laptops.
translation.fr: le seul bar de Brooklyn sans hipsters connectés.

translation.en: - Hmm. - Though I did see one with a typewriter.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai vu une machine à écrire.

translation.en: I can't wait to read it.
I've been reading that Shaker book you recommended.
translation.fr: J'ai lu le livre sur les Shakers que tu m'as conseillé.

translation.en: I just love how self- sufficient they were.
Like…
grow their own food and…
made their own…
buildings and furniture.
That's my dream.
It's just to get off the grid and move to a small town.
translation.fr: De me couper de tout et de vivre dans un petit village.

translation.en: Well,
let's just fucking do it, then.
translation.fr: on n'a qu'à le faire, putain.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Yeah.
Have you heard about Pleasant Hill?
It's one of the biggest Shaker settlements.
translation.fr: L'un des plus grands sites de Shakers.

translation.en: We could open up a furniture store and have a cute little apartment above it.
translation.fr: On pourrait ouvrir un magasin de meubles avec un joli appartement au-dessus.

translation.en: Yeah, and they've got some amazing cedar and maple trees up there.
translation.fr: Oui, et il y a de très beaux cèdres et érables là-bas.

translation.en: I'm looking at my Papa Bear chair right now.
translation.fr: Je regarde mon fauteuil Papa Bear.

translation.en: Our Papa Bear chair.
Thinking about you,
carving a love seat out of a beautiful piece of cedar.
translation.fr: qui sculpte un fauteuil d'amour dans du bois de cèdre.

translation.en: Your sexy wood talk is giving me wood.
translation.fr: Quand tu dis ça, tu me rends dure comme du bois.

translation.en: - Oh, really? -
Although we should probably meet face- to- face before we run off together.
translation.fr: On devrait se rencontrer avant de partir ensemble.

translation.en: Guys, are we ready to start the meeting?
would you like to kick off the sharing?
Would you mind if I didn't?
Perhaps you could tell us about your rock bottom?
translation.fr: Parlez-nous de votre descente aux enfers.

translation.en: Well, I haven't really had a rock bottom,
so maybe someone else in the group who has should share.
translation.fr: alors quelqu'un qui a vécu ça pourrait en parler.

translation.en: Candy, it's important to face the facts
translation.fr: Candy, il faut affronter le fait

translation.en: that our disease causes us to make terrible mistakes.
translation.fr: que notre maladie nous pousse à faire des erreurs.

translation.en: Like that piece of shit movie you made
about the girl who gets super strength when she gets high?
translation.fr: avec la fille qui est forte quand elle est stone.

translation.en: Excuse me, it was called Pippi Bongstocking
and it wasn't shit, it was good.
She got the munchies and she ate a building. It was stupid.
translation.fr: Elle a faim et elle bouffe un immeuble. C'est débile.

translation.en: It was a gingerbread house, fucking hilarious.
translation.fr: Une maison en pain d'épice. C'était drôle.

translation.en: People, could we bring the focus back to recovery, please?
translation.fr: Pourrions-nous reparler de comment se soigner ?

translation.en: Thank you.
This must be a real wake- up call for you, a big Hollywood hotshot.
translation.fr: Ça doit te secouer, la star d'Hollywood.

translation.en: Yeah, I've never cleaned a table before. It's a real eye- opener.
translation.fr: Oui, je n'avais jamais nettoyé de table. C'est une révélation.

translation.en: Yeah. Everybody's freaking out.
I was like, You guys, calm down. She's just, like, a lady.
translation.fr: Mais ça suffit, t'es qu'une femme.

translation.en: A lady who takes a dump.
Every day.
I might have seen maybe one of your early movies,
translation.fr: J'ai dû voir tes premiers films

translation.en: but never any of the sequels
and I definitely never read that Vanity Fair profile piece about you.
translation.fr: et j'ai jamais lu ton portrait dans Vanity Fair.

translation.en: Um… I didn't wanna mention this in front of everybody,
but I'm Barbara Cox's assistant, the director.
translation.fr: Je suis l'assistante de Barbara Cox, la réalisatrice.

translation.en: Barbara! Yes, of course.
She's always been very nice to me.
translation.fr: Elle a toujours été cool avec moi.

translation.en: Oh my God, she's the best.
She's actually paying for me to be here now.
Is it because she got sentenced to rehab and you took her place?
translation.fr: Elle a été condamnée à une cure et tu la remplaces ?

translation.en: What? No, girl. That is crazy.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Mais non. Ce serait de la folie.

translation.en: I kind of had a breakdown a couple weeks ago.
You know what? Here's a tip. Don't mix Fentanyl, Bennies and heroin.
translation.fr: Un conseil : ne mélange pas le Fentanyl, les Bennies et l'héro.

translation.en: - Did anyone ever tell you that? - No.
Look, I know you're not supposed to have contact with the outside,
translation.fr: Je sais qu'on ne doit pas être en contact avec l'extérieur,

translation.en: but Barbara messaged me about you.
translation.fr: mais Barbara m'a écrit à ton sujet.

translation.en: She wants to know if you're up for doing a cameo in the Saddle Up reboot.
translation.fr: Elle voudrait que tu joues une scène dans le reboot de En selles.

translation.en: Really?
Only thing is, is that it films in a couple weeks.
translation.fr: Mais ils tournent dans quelques semaines.

translation.en: - I feel like you're still gonna be here. - Shit!
translation.fr: - Tu seras toujours là. - Et merde !

translation.en: Listen, not a big deal.
Take it from an old pro in the rehab motherfucking game.
translation.fr: Tu parles à la pro des centres de désintoxication.

translation.en: If you can convince the ladies with the clipboards
translation.fr: Si tu convaincs les nanas aux presse-papiers

translation.en: that you are serious about your road to recovery,
they'll send you home early.
Okay, would you tell Barbara I'm up for it,
translation.fr: OK, dis à Barbara que je suis partante,

translation.en: but I have one condition.
Girl, name it!
Do you remember my old stand- in?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de ma doublure ?

translation.en: Oh my God, yes. How can I forget her? She's such a fucking loser.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu, oui. Comment l'oublier ? Quelle tocarde.

translation.en: Okay,
my name is Candy and I am an alcoholic,
translation.fr: je m'appelle Candy et je suis alcoolique,

translation.en: and my story is that I love drinking booze.
translation.fr: et mon histoire, c'est que j'adore boire de l'alcool.

translation.en: I love drinking booze.
In fact, it's my favorite thing to drink.
And, uh, when I've drunk enough booze, I do terrible things like…
translation.fr: Et quand je bois beaucoup, je fais des trucs horribles comme…

translation.en: falling over or…
I'll drink more and then say terrible things,
translation.fr: Je rebois et je dis des horreurs,

translation.en: like Get lost, or other things and sometimes I'll pee all over myself,
translation.fr: comme Cassez-vous, ou d'autres choses et… parfois, je fais pipi sur moi,

translation.en: and other people.
And that's who I am.
I am a booze- loving,
translation.fr: Je suis une accro à l'alcool

translation.en: foul- mouthed person
who says and does wrong things and--
translation.fr: qui dit et fait des choses terribles et…

translation.en: And pees on themselves and doesn't always clean it up.
translation.fr: Qui fait pipi sur elle et qui nettoie pas toujours.

translation.en: Thank you, Candy.
I-- I know that was hard for you. Well done.
translation.fr: Ça a dû être difficile. Bravo.

translation.en: Well done.
You've really turned a corner.
Who's ready to share next?
You should probably stay until the bottom feeders leave.
translation.fr: Reste jusqu'à ce que les vautours partent.

translation.en: Really?
That would be amazing.
Sure.
Pick a guest room. I've got, like, 13.
So…
the most incredible thing happened at rehab.
translation.fr: il s'est produit un truc incroyable pendant la cure.

translation.en: You got a job offer, an acting job.
translation.fr: Tu as reçu une offre, un rôle.

translation.en: Yeah?
The director Barbara Cox asked for you personally,
and they need a stand- in.
translation.fr: et ils ont besoin d'une doublure.

translation.en: So your comeback starts now.
They want you on set Friday night.
translation.fr: Ils veulent te voir vendredi soir.

translation.en: I can't do it.
- What? - I can't do the film.
We had a deal.
I'm not doing the film
translation.fr: Je ne fais pas le film

translation.en: because I have something really important that night.
translation.fr: car j'ai quelque chose d'important ce soir-là.

translation.en: A date. With who?
A guy, Steve.
And he doesn't know I'm Candy the actress.
translation.fr: Et il ne sait pas que je suis Candy l'actrice.

translation.en: Thinks I'm Cathy the carpenter.
translation.fr: Pour lui, je suis Cathy la menuisière.

translation.en: - The what? - It's a long story.
translation.fr: - La quoi ? - C'est une longue histoire.

translation.en: I set up a profile on this website for woodworkers,
translation.fr: J'ai créé un compte sur un site de menuiserie

translation.en: Carpentry Talk.
It was a nice vacation from…
…the old movie star missy.
translation.fr: de ma vie de star du cinéma.

translation.en: I felt like-- I feel like
translation.fr: Je me sentais… Je me sens

translation.en: I'm more myself as Cathy Tyler, carpenter,
translation.fr: plus moi-même en Cathy Tyler, la menuisière,

translation.en: than I ever did as Candy Black, asshole.
It's my real name.
Louis came up with Candy Black. Anyway, I met Steve on this website.
translation.fr: Louis a inventé Candy Black. Bref, j'ai rencontré Steve sur ce site.

translation.en: He's the first guy that's…
ever not seen dollar signs and billboards
translation.fr: ne me voit pas comme un porte-monnaie sur pattes

translation.en: before they actually see me.
All we do is talk about furniture.
translation.fr: On ne parle que de meubles.

translation.en: Anyway, we've been talking about meeting up for months,
translation.fr: On parle de se voir depuis des mois,

translation.en: and Friday night is our anniversary.
Well,
why don't you just tell him the truth?
translation.fr: pourquoi ne pas lui dire la vérité ?

translation.en: And then you could reschedule.
Tell him I've been lying to him every day for a year?
translation.fr: Je vais lui dire que je lui mens depuis un an ?

translation.en: I can't do that on our first date.
translation.fr: Je vais pas dire ça au premier rencard.

translation.en: It probably would make him happy.
It's like buying what you think it's a Ford Focus
translation.fr: C'est comme quand tu penses acheter une Ford Focus,

translation.en: and then finding out it's a Maserati.
translation.fr: puis tu découvres que c'est une Maserati.

translation.en: I can't ruin this relationship so you can get your old job back.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas gâcher cette histoire pour que tu retrouves ton travail.

translation.en: I went to rehab for you. We had a deal.
translation.fr: Je suis allée en cure pour toi. Tu me l'as promis.

translation.en: I know, I'm sorry.
I want my old life back.
Look, I'm sorry. I know this is really shitty, I just--
translation.fr: Je suis désolée. C'est dégueulasse, mais je…

translation.en: So…
what is your master plan?
How long are you going to be Cathy the carpenter?
translation.fr: Tu veux être Cathy la menuisière combien de temps ?

translation.en: As long as I want.
I mean, don't you want Steve to know who you really are?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas que Steve sache qui tu es vraiment ?

translation.en: Cathy is who I really am.
RIP Candy.
Long live Cathy.
Hey.
Wow, you look great.
What's the matter?
It's from Steve.
What does it say?
I'm sorry. I wanted to tell you in person,
translation.fr: J'aurais voulu te le dire en personne,

translation.en: but it's simpler this way.
translation.fr: mais c'est plus simple comme ça.

translation.en: The truth is I'm married and my wife…
translation.fr: En fait, je suis marié et ma femme…

translation.en: …found out about us.
Even though I love you, I love…
her more.
I know that doesn't make… sense right now.
I can't see you or speak to you or message you anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne peux plus t'appeler ou t'envoyer un message.

translation.en: She's…
reading all my messages, so please don't try to contact me.
translation.fr: lit tous mes messages, alors n'essaie pas de me contacter.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. It was…
great getting to know you.
Oh, sweetie, that's terrible. I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: Ma chérie, c'est horrible. Je suis désolée.

translation.en: At least he bothered to write you
translation.fr: Au moins, il a pris la peine de t'envoyer

translation.en: something long and eloquent and beautifully written.
translation.fr: un message long, clair, et très bien écrit.

translation.en: I knew it was too good to be true.
translation.fr: C'était trop beau pour être vrai.

translation.en: I knew it.
Gosh, married this whole time?
And he never mentioned it?
translation.fr: Et il ne m'a rien dit ?

translation.en: What a lying sack of shit.
Well, maybe work will make you feel better.
translation.fr: Travailler pourrait te remonter le moral.

translation.en: Hello?
Sorry, I had to call you.
I'm here.
Uh, I know you're scared. I'm scared too, but if you don't come meet me at this bar,
translation.fr: Tu as peur, moi aussi, mais si tu ne me rejoins pas dans ce bar,

translation.en: I'm gonna call you every hour on the hour until you show up.
translation.fr: j'appellerai jusqu'à ce que tu viennes.

translation.en: We have to talk in person tonight.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on se voie ce soir.

translation.en: - Have fun on your date. - It's not a date.
I'm telling someone to get lost.
Cathy?
Steve?
You look about as nervous as I feel, I figured it must be you.
translation.fr: Tu es aussi nerveuse que moi, ça devait être toi.

translation.en: Hi, um…
I made a bet with myself over whether or not you'd make it and…
translation.fr: Je me suis parié que tu viendrais peut-être ou pas et…

translation.en: looks like I lost. Or won, depending on how you look at it.
translation.fr: j'ai perdu. Ou gagné, selon le point de vue.

translation.en: I hope you're not disappointed that I don't look like a chair.
translation.fr: Pas trop déçue que je ressemble pas à une chaise ?

translation.en: - No.  - Okay.
You look great.
Thanks. You too.
What I can see of you.
- - Cathy.
Hello!
Do you have a cold?
'Cause your voice… You sound like…
translation.fr: Parce que ta voix… On dirait…

translation.en: No. This is me.
This is the real me.
So…
How's life?
Oh, um, well, I haven't made much progress on my book since last we spoke.
translation.fr: J'ai à peine avancé mon livre depuis la dernière fois qu'on s'est parlé.

translation.en: Oh yeah. I get the same way with books. You just lose the thread.
translation.fr: Je te comprends. Quand je lis, je me perds.

translation.en: I only got halfway through Gone Girl.
translation.fr: J'ai lu que la moitié de Les Apparences.

translation.en: Good one.
It was good, I just got really busy.
translation.fr: J'aimais bien, mais j'ai été débordée.

translation.en: The reason why I haven't been able to focus on writing my Shaker book
translation.fr: J'étais incapable de me concentrer sur le livre

translation.en: is because I've just been so damn nervous about today.
translation.fr: car j'étais trop stressé pour ce soir.

translation.en: - Me too. - I mean…
This last year, talking to you, has been one of the most…
translation.fr: Cette année à parler avec toi a été…

translation.en: wonderful, intense, life- changing experiences I've ever had.
translation.fr: l'une des plus belles expériences que j'aie vécues de toute ma vie.

translation.en: We shared so many details about ourselves, things I never even told anybody.
translation.fr: On a tellement échangé, je t'ai confié des choses que je n'avais jamais dites.

translation.en: And I just-- I needed this…
translation.fr: Et je voulais… que tout ça…

translation.en: to be real.
It is real, right?
Yes.
It is real, it is totally real.
It's great to finally see your face, Cathy.
translation.fr: Je suis content de te voir, enfin.

translation.en: There's something really important I need to tell you.
translation.fr: Je dois te dire quelque chose de très important.

translation.en: Yeah?
I changed my cell phone number.
translation.fr: J'ai changé de numéro de téléphone.

translation.en: Where have you been?
Getting you a pizza. I thought it might cheer you up.
translation.fr: J'ai pris une pizza pour te remonter le moral.

translation.en: Ugh. You're awfully fucking chipper.
Ooh. This is supposed to be amazing.
Yeah?  Shaker furniture is so hot right now.
translation.fr: - Ah oui ? - Les meubles de Shakers sont à la mode.

translation.en: Do you mind if I borrow it?
It's Louis.
Why is that asshole calling so late?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ce connard appelle si tard ?

translation.en: I bet it's important.
If you're so fucking interested in it,
you answer it.
Hi, Louis.
Hey. So, The Today Show wants a one- on- one interview.
translation.fr: Salut. Le Today Show veut un entretien exclusif.

translation.en: Oh! Um… okay.
And Warrior Water,
which is this new water that I guess wants to fight other waters,
translation.fr: cette nouvelle eau qui, je suppose, veut combattre les autres eaux,

translation.en: has offered you a bunch of money just to drink the water on camera.
translation.fr: te propose un paquet de fric pour que tu en boives à l'écran.

translation.en: I'm talking low to mid six figures. What do you say?
translation.fr: C'est un contrat à six chiffres. Ça te dit ?

translation.en: Okay. Will you-- Does--
- Hold on a moment. - Sure.
Take all the time you need.
Look, I know you didn't wanna do that movie, but this isn't acting.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu ne veux pas faire le film, mais là, c'est autre chose.

translation.en: - This is just you being you. - No.
translation.fr: - Tu dois juste être toi. - Non.

translation.en: Now that it's over with that worthless, cheating asshole,
translation.fr: Maintenant que c'est fini avec ce connard infidèle,

translation.en: you have nothing to lose.
translation.fr: tu n'as plus rien à perdre.

translation.en: How about the fact that I don't give a shit?
translation.fr: Et si je te dis que je m'en fous ?

translation.en: Well, you can't just stay here and rot. You have to get back out there.
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas rester là à te morfondre. Il faut que tu y retournes.

translation.en: And these days, an interview is what you do
translation.fr: Et de nos jours, on fait une interview

translation.en: when you're famous and you've done something wrong.
translation.fr: quand on est célèbre et qu'on a fauté.

translation.en: You make penance with the nation.
Exactly.
Fuck that.
We had a deal,
and if you're not gonna get me my old job back,
translation.fr: de m'aider à retrouver mon ancien job,

translation.en: then you should give me half the appearance fee.
translation.fr: alors tu me dois la moitié du cachet de l'interview.

translation.en: Okay.
I'll do the interview.
Good.
But no comeback.
I'm doing this for the cash, to pay you what I owe you.
translation.fr: Je fais ça pour le fric, pour te donner ton dû.

translation.en: And then you can go fuck yourself.
- Louis, we're-- - Yes.
- I'm in. - Yeah?
It's great to be back.
It is good to have you back.
Thank you, Louis, for believing in me.
translation.fr: Merci de croire en moi, Louis.

translation.en: The car's here.
It's time to go to the studio.
You're gonna miss the interview. This is important.
translation.fr: Tu vas rater l'interview. C'est important.

translation.en: So what?
I don't give a shit about that dumb interview, anyway.
translation.fr: De toute façon, je me fous de cette interview débile.

translation.en: - Well, you should! -
All you have to do is say the word sorry.
translation.fr: Tu dois juste dire le mot désolée.

translation.en: It's not brain surgery. What is wrong with you?
translation.fr: C'est pas sorcier. Tu débloques vraiment.

translation.en: If it's so easy, you go fucking do it.
translation.fr: Si c'est si facile, vas-y, bordel.

should we just skip rehearsal, you want to go in for a take?
translation.fr: tu fais une scène directe, sans répéter ?

translation.en: Well, um,
they just gave me the sides last night and I haven't read the whole script,
translation.fr: je n'ai eu le script qu'hier soir, et je n'ai pas tout lu,

translation.en: so I don't know what my motivation is.
translation.fr: alors j'ignore l'intention de mon personnage.

translation.en: Your motivation is that you climb up on this bale of hay,
translation.fr: L'intention de ton personnage, c'est d'escalader cette botte de foin,

translation.en: and then you dive off
and land in this pile of cow shit.
translation.fr: et de finir dans cette bouse.

translation.en: The cow shit, of course.
- Yeah. - Um…
Do I really have to get up on the bale of hay
translation.fr: Je dois vraiment escalader la botte de foin

translation.en: and then dive into the cow shit?
translation.fr: et me jeter dans la bouse ?

translation.en: Well, yeah. I mean, that's the whole scene.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est le principe de la scène.

translation.en: That's the joke. It's what you did in the first picture.
translation.fr: C'est ça le gag. Tu l'avais fait dans le premier film.

translation.en: Anyway, this whole physical comedy stuff is what you do. Your thing. You're a genius.
translation.fr: Tu es douée pour ce genre de scène. C'est ton truc. Tu es géniale.

translation.en: Yeah. All right. Great.
Wonderful.
- - Okay, here we go.
All right, everybody. Let's get ready.
And… mark it.
Okay, settle and…
Action!
- Barbara, I'm sorry, but I-- - Cut!
I can't do this scene. Okay? I can't do it.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas jouer ça. OK ? Je ne peux pas.

translation.en: - I cannot do this scene. - Candy, please.
translation.fr: - Je n'y arrive pas. - S'il te plaît.

translation.en: Let's not do this again.
That said, I'll be right back.
That's the Copley you bought in Washington County, right?
translation.fr: C'est le Copley acheté dans le comté de Washington ?

translation.en: Right.
What are you gonna do about Paula? Call the cops?
translation.fr: Et Paula ? Tu vas appeler les flics ?

translation.en: And get arrested for sending a psycho to rehab for me?
translation.fr: Et me faire arrêter pour l'avoir envoyée faire ma cure ?

translation.en: That psycho has stolen your life. Don't you want it back?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas retrouver ton identité ?

translation.en: No.
So you're just gonna let her have your house, your life, everything?
translation.fr: Alors, tu vas lui laisser ta maison, ta vie, tout ?

translation.en: I never liked that house or that life, anyway.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais aimé cette maison ou cette vie.

translation.en: And what about your career?
I've been so lucky,
but I'm really excited to play myself for a while.
translation.fr: mais j'ai hâte de jouer mon propre rôle quelques temps.

translation.en: Well,
I'm excited to finally meet you.
The real you.
This isn't how I imagined us meeting. No, me neither.
translation.fr: - J'avais imaginé un autre scénario. - Moi aussi.

translation.en: But I'm so happy that we have.
So am I.
How about joining me in the Papa Bear?
translation.fr: Et si tu me rejoignais sur le Papa Bear ?

translation.en: Candy!
Oh shit, is that Paula?
Oh, fuck!
Candy!
- Candy! - I'll deal with this.
What the fuck? This better be important.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu me déranges pas pour rien.

translation.en: Look, I know that I'm the last person you wanna speak to
translation.fr: Je sais que tu n'as pas envie de me parler,

translation.en: or even think about the fact that I exist,
and I don't blame you, but you got to do this film.
translation.fr: et je te comprends, mais tu dois faire ce film.

translation.en: I can't do it.
Everyone's there waiting and I want to walk in and tell them I'm not you,
translation.fr: Tout le monde m'attend et je veux tout leur dire,

translation.en: and then you can come in and do the scene and nail it.
translation.fr: et tu pourras venir et jouer la scène.

translation.en: You were right.
I'm not an actress.
I'm just a stand- in.
I think you can absolutely dive headfirst from a bale of hay into a pile of cow shit.
translation.fr: Je te pense capable de plonger d'une botte de foin dans une bouse.

translation.en: Oh, I can dive headfirst into cow shit,
translation.fr: Je peux plonger dans de la bouse,

translation.en: but nobody can dive headfirst into cow shit like you.
translation.fr: mais personne ne peut plonger dans une bouse comme toi.

translation.en: I mean,
there is only one Candy Black.
translation.fr: il n'ya qu'une seule Candy Black.

translation.en: Yeah.
And I'm looking at her.
translation.fr: Et elle est face à moi.

translation.en: What do you mean?
You want this part so bad?
It's all yours.
And you mean it? You're not fucking with me?
translation.fr: C'est vrai ? Tu te fous pas de moi ?

translation.en: Just try not to be too big of an asshole.
translation.fr: Essaie de ne pas être trop infecte.

translation.en: And don't give me that shit about not being an actress,
translation.fr: Et arrête avec ton Je ne suis pas comédienne,

translation.en: because you've been fooling everyone for months.
translation.fr: car tu balades tout le monde depuis des mois.

translation.en: No, I'm just a coat stand.
I don't have your talent.
A talent for self- loathing
and sacrificing every ounce of dignity I have for a laugh?
translation.fr: et sacrifier son amour-propre pour faire rire ?

translation.en: You can do that.
I'm really sorry about Steve.
Maybe he's the one thing I shouldn't have taken from you.
translation.fr: C'est peut-être lui que je n'aurais pas dû te voler.

translation.en: Yeah, there's been one thing I've been meaning to give you for Steve.
translation.fr: Oui, je voulais te donner un truc pour Steve.

translation.en: Oh, shit!
Dude, it's Candy fucking Black!
- Let me get a selfie real quick. -
- Enjoy. -
Watch this.
Hit me where it hurts!
Maybe you could help me up.
- - Okay, people. Quiet down now.
And action!
Hit me where it hurts.
Cut!
Let's clean the shit off her face. Let's go again.
We're going again right away.
Big shit is up! Big shit is up!
translation.fr: L'image est calée, tout le monde !

translation.en: Happy birthday, gorgeous.
- A cupcake for breakfast? - Why not?
translation.fr: - Un cupcake au réveil ? - Pourquoi pas ?

translation.en: Now make a wish.
I already got all my wishes.
Thank you.
- I'm gonna go open up. - Okay.
